titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Ways and Means in the One Hundred Fourteenth Congress.
Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Ways and Means in the One Hundred Fourteenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: Provides amounts for the expenses of the House Committee on Ways and Means for the 114th Congress.
